From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Rampage knelt to his knees. "No, my friend. Hold on." He looked at the
Infecticon through narrow eyes, filled with rage and hate. "You will
live to regret this." Rampage whispered, pointing at the creature. "But
not for long." He then hoisted the Mutate over his shoulder, and jogged
away from battle, on the way throwing the Mutate up, and converting to
his tank mode, catching the Mutate, then he slowly headed away.
